docs.text:
Welcome to OLCTools


Here, you will find documentation on the various sub-packages available within OLCTools.


BioTools


Wrappers for commonly used programs, as well as a few handy methods.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Here, you will find documentation on the various sub-packages available within OLCTools.  BioTools  Wrappers for commonly used programs, as well as a few handy methods.
docs.title: Welcome to OLCTools

docs.text:
BBTools Overview


BBTools is an excellent suite of programs created by Brian Bushnell, which you can find 
here
.


The following wrappers for BBTools have been written:


BBMap


from biotools import bbtools
bbtools.bbmap(reference, forward_in, out_bam)




BBDuk_Trim


BBDuk_Filter


BBDuk_Bait
docs.title: Bbtools
